snippet: In an essay published this week in a Communist Party magazine, President Hu Jintao said the West is trying to dominate China by spreading its culture and ideology.
abstract: President Hu Jintao, in an essay published in a Communist Party magazine, says the West is trying to dominate China by spreading its culture and ideology.
lead_paragraph: In an essay published this week in a Communist Party magazine, President Hu Jintao said the West is trying to dominate China by spreading its culture and ideology.

headline.seo: China’s Leader Pushes Back at Lady Gaga and Western Culture
headline.main: China’s President Lashes Out at Western Culture
headline.print_headline: China’s President Lashes Out at Western Culture
